-   [![stitches]](https://stitches.dev/)

### Concepts studed or applied

-   Next Framework

## üöÄ Run project

```bash
# access the project folder
cd pckages/ignite-shop

 #install dependencies
 yarn # or npm install

 #start app
 yarn dev # or npm run dev
```
